Seal characters (1)

鲵字的基本解释

鲵
（鯢）
ní
〔大鲵〕两栖动物，身体长而扁，生在山溪中。肉鲜美可食。叫的声音像婴儿，所以俗称“娃娃鱼”。
〔小鲵〕两栖动物，体形与大鲵相似，但较小，牙齿呈Ｖ形，生活在水边的草地里。
（鯢）

鲵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ní］
［《廣韻》五稽切，平齊，疑。］
“鲵1”的繁体字。
(1)动物名。属两栖纲。俗称娃娃鱼，亦名山椒鱼。体长约1米，皮肤黏滑，头扁圆，口大，四肢短小，尾呈鳍状，宜游泳，栖息于山溪中。
(2)雌鲸。
(3)小鱼。
(4)通“齯”。谓老人齿落再生。

鲵字的英文翻译

◎ 鲵
giant salamander

鲵字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鯢； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1480第51
【唐韻】五稽切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】硏奚切，?音倪。【說文】刺魚也。【爾雅·釋魚】鯢大者謂之鰕。【註】今鯢魚似鮎，四脚，前似獮猴後似狗，聲如小兒啼，大者長八九尺，別名鰕。【疏】鯢，雌鯨也。【本草】鯢魚，一名王鮪，在山溪中，似鮎，有四脚長尾，能上樹，天旱則含水上葉覆身，鳥來飮水，因而取之。伊洛閒亦有，聲如小兒啼，故曰鯢魚。一名鱯魚，一名人魚，膏燃燭不滅。【左傳·宣十二年】取其鯨鯢而封之。【註】鯨鯢，大魚名。以喩不義之人吞食小國。【疏】雄曰鯨，雌曰鯢。又【莊子·庚桑楚】尋常之溝，巨魚無所還其體，而鯢鰌爲之制。【註】制，折也，謂小魚得曲折也。又【外物篇】灌瀆守鯢鮒。【註】鯢、鮒，皆小魚也。

salamander
Basic explanation of words
salamander
(salamander)
ní
〔Giant Salamander〕Amphibians, with long and flat bodies, born in mountains and streams. The meat is delicious and edible. It sounds like a baby, so it is commonly known as "baby fish".
[Small Salamander] Amphibians, similar in body shape to giant salamanders, but smaller, with V-shaped teeth, living in grass near the water.
(salamander)
salamander
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [ní]
["Guangyun" five pieces of cut, even, suspicious. ]
Traditional characters for "鲵1".
(1) Animal name. It belongs to the class of amphibians. Commonly known as baby fish, also known as Sanjiao fish. The body length is about 1 meter, the skin is slimy, the head is flat, the mouth is large, the limbs are short, and the tail is fin-shaped. It is suitable for swimming and lives in mountain streams.
(2) Female whales.
(3) Small fish.
(4) Through "齯". It is said that the old man's teeth are regenerated
salamander

salamander
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　鲵; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1480 51
[Tang Yun] Five Ji Cuts [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Hao Xi cut,? Yin Ni. [Said the text] Spearfish also. 【Erya·Shiyu】The big salamander is called 鰕. [Note] Today, the salamander resembles a catfish with four legs, the front resembles a monkey and the rear resembles a dog, and the sound resembles a cry of a child. The older one is eight or nine feet long, and it is also called 鰕. [Sparse] Salamander, female whale also. [Materia Medica] Salamander, a king tuna, in the mountains and streams, like a catfish, with four legs and long tails, can climb trees, when drought, the upper leaves covered with water, the birds come to eat water, so take it. There is also Yiluo Xian, the sound is like a child's cry, so it is called salamander. A schnauzer, a mermaid, the candle burns indefinitely. [Zuo Zhuan·Xuan Twelve Years] Take its whale salamander and seal it. [Note] Whale salamander, big fish name. To devour a small country with unrighteous people. 【Sparse】The male is called a whale, and the female is called a salamander. Also [Zhuangzi·Gengsangchu] The ordinary ditch, the giant fish has nothing to return to its body, but the salamander is made by it. [Note] System, zigzag, said Xiaoyu has twists and turns. Also 【Foreign Objects】Gundu guardian salamander. [Note] Salamander and crucian carp are all small fish.
